website_summaries.verdict: With a premium build, good camera and free accessories in the box, Alcatel's Idol 4S is a solid midrange buy.
pros: Alcatel's Idol 4S comes packed with features and accessories
It has a high-end design and build, a great camera, impressive display and a convenience button dubbed the Boom Key
cons: The Boom Key needs finessing: It's easy to accidentally activate
The fingerprint scanner is small and sometimes difficult to engage

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever hands down
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best phone I've ever used. Great price point but even better performance and image quality of the screen and sound quality from speakers. Will stick with this phone for a while unless Alcatel can somehow find a way to out do the Idol 4s.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J

customer_reviews.title: The price I got this for cannot be beaten. ...
customer_reviews.text: The price I got this for cannot be beaten. This phone is absolute value for money. Forget the extras. Those aren't top line. But the phone feels premium. It performs premium and it looks premium. My only issue is that Alcatel will not upgrade the OS. It ships with Android 6 and that wont be upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good phone, just didn't come to me in working condition
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived without a charger, and it would not turn on. I finally let it charge overnight, and was able to start it. Seemed to have a great audio . I returned it because it was sold as brand new, but looks like it was actually an "out of the box" phone. The name of the store reflected purchasing out of the box items, even though it was advertised as new. I didn't want a phone that potentially already had a battery with a short life.
customer_reviews.author: Kawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for android dev, no nugat though
customer_reviews.text: Great for Android development, camera is amazing. Gpu and cpu can handle a ton of intense work load, however the phone does heat up very quick almost to hot to hold when at 100% load. The 2K screen is crystal clear. Still waiting for nugat as of 1/11/18
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It's such a waste that it's funny😂.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who is talking about how it loops constantly isn't lying. It happened to me in about 8 months and it is still usable if your fine with keeping it plugged in with a charger the whole time. Once you remove it form the charger it immediately boot loops. If you buy this it is most likely to boot loop in about a few months of using it. At least the speakers were nice while the phone still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to recommend this Alcatel effort
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the phone but after 3 months it started to shut down randomly and get really hot even when under no load. This progressively worsened to a boot loop condition that even a factory reset couldn't work through. UPDATE April 2018 Returned under warranty and phone was replaced promptly even though the RMA process is somewhat convoluted. So far the replacement is working well so I added a star to my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very dissatisfied with this phone.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very dissatisfied with this phone. Had it less that a year and is useless. Phone goes into a boot loop and is pretty much useless. Requested a replacement and have not heard back. Not even a "sorry that you're having a problem with your phone". PS: Alcatel, if you read this review, please send me a replacement..
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price and the headset is a great perk. Both work fantastic no problems
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Brita

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked normally for three months and after that, it just went in boot loop mode and it can't hard reset. everybody will push you around and you won't get any headway with the phone. Sorry, we bought that phone
customer_reviews.author: alex jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: It works great with a borrowed Samsung Galaxy S7! However, I had to return it because it wouldn't work with my Samsung Galaxy Folder 2.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed screen, edges are exposed and will crack without dropping. Otherwise excellent phone. Better than Iphone
customer_reviews.author: Glen Clements

customer_reviews.title: Enhance 4G LTE Mode is missing
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great I received it already, the features is very attractive especially with VR. Only the Cellular network that the "Enhanced 4G LTE mode" is not, there can this be addressed ASAP?
customer_reviews.author: Maareke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it to death, better than the idol3 I previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Brandyon Alexandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Phone has been great so far. I very vivid display and a high quality build. Battery life is OK not great but overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is filled with Friggin Adware baked into all ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is filled with Friggin Adware baked into all of its default apps and you can't uninstall most of them, Incredibly deceptive, and invasive of privacy. Stay away!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Temple Jones

customer_reviews.title: At first phone was great until I updated to nougat and Alcatel killed the ...
customer_reviews.text: At first phone was great until I updated to nougat and Alcatel killed the boom key and the included screen protector is a joke it fits and looks good had it in my lap and got up phone fell less than 3feet screen protector shattered on wooden floor then phone power button doesn't work frequently have to keep fighting to get phone to come on
customer_reviews.author: dizzkid

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and great value. The screen and speakers are awesome. Screen nice and sharp. Speakers clear and loud. Headphones are high quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Phone lasted 1.5 years and then would not startup. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Warren

customer_reviews.title: this smartphone charges super fast. The screen is super crisp vibrant colors ...
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an Asus Zenfone 2, this smartphone charges super fast. The screen is super crisp vibrant colors and with a VR, JBL headphones and a faux tempered screen protector can't go wrong with the package on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Munoz

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had written a bad review, before even thinking of taking it to the store. Found out they use smart sims, so all they had to do was change my IMEI. Bam, phone works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua James Coe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, fast but it heat up very quick and cool down quick too.
customer_reviews.author: m.wong

customer_reviews.title: Get a case get a case get a case
customer_reviews.text: BUY A CASE, BUY A CASE BUY A CASE! every revier and unboxing I saw when this phone came out showed one included - WRONG. The phone is awesome but more slippery than a fish. Had is less than a week and both sides cracked while in my FSfjxrhdyxING pocket.........
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stefan

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: CONNECTION ON PHONE CALLS IS TERRIBLE, DOES NOT KEEP TRACK OF CALLS WITH DUAL SIMS, DOES NOT ALWAYS SCREEN MIRROR.... MANY MANY ISSUES
customer_reviews.author: T D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this phone because the Bluetooth software was not compatible with my 2015 Prius.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: After exactly one year of use the phone started to heat up and reboot. Took it to an authorized service center and they said it couldn't be fixed. Amazon doesn't accept return or refund so it is my loss. This is the first of three phones I've purchased form Amazon on the last 16 months. The second one (Samsung) started to present problems within 3 months of use. I won't be buying any phone through Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Boot loop issues
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for a month and I started having issues with it freezing all the time. Then it went into boot loop and that was the end of that. It did have great speakers and a decent display.
customer_reviews.author: snopro

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this Device
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Device, Speaker quality very very very Good and loud. I've had a few hiccups but not bad enough to mention very minor. Screen very beautiful, compare with all the other high end devices it holds its own. Performance runs like a champ in my book. I would recommend this phone to buy, I wouldn't personally buy it again because of the phone having a glass back also there is a huge lack of selections when it comes to protective cases. I'm rocking the phone without a case so I know soon it will get exposed in my pocket or it will slip out of my pocket and fall once it does that RIP Idol 4s.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Blaine

customer_reviews.title: great screen, great speakers
customer_reviews.text: great screen, great speakers, ok battery life (charges really quick so i dont care) runs a little warm from time to time. pretty good camera aswell. i dont if i would get the phone for $300 but if it is on sale for under $250 i would get again
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Phone worked great up until a few days ago
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked great up until a few days ago. Haven't owned the phone for a year, and it's shutting itself down and not starting up. I haven't gone through all the troubleshooting loops, but I shouldn't have to. I hate the fact that if you want a decent phone that will last you a 2-5 years, you need to dish out $600-$1000.
customer_reviews.author: tbeckett

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy it when they increase the battery size
customer_reviews.text: I am returning it.The battery drains too quickly and phone gets really hot; could be that I got a defective unit. I'm coming back to Android from iPhone 6S where I needed to charge throughout the day and it was so basic. It's too bad because the IDOL's display/speed/features are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: N19B19

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this phone so much I convinced my husband to try it out. He loves it too now! Best thing about the Idol 4s is the amount of storage the phone has built in! Love how you can put all your apps on it and all have room left.
customer_reviews.author: troublealg

customer_reviews.title: The battering is not replaceable.  Once the battery dies, so it the cell phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone's battery is not replacement and you have to charge the phone daily or it will not make it through the day. Overall, the phone is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I have had this a year now and it has been flawless. Don't miss my high end expensive phone at all
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good phone, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good phone, especially for the money! Great specs, excellent design, great picture quality, sound is incredible, both from the speakers and from Bluetooth. I personally love the phone, Android 6 is good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone. It has not slowed down due to space, the fingerprint scanner works a good 98% of the time, and the battery lasts well under heavy usage. Definitely my favorite phone I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: LexCo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price, not the fastest or largest, but does everything I want and then some. Camera is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Really great mid price phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, loud clear speakers , love all the features and the vr goggles are fun and a great bonus ,would definitely recommend this phone and would buy again. Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.author: rosalia v

customer_reviews.title: DECENT PHONE FOR THE PRICE, SKIP THE VR
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone for the price. Unique stereo speakers. VR is not well made and I stopped using it. Felt like I was going to crack the phone just trying to snap it into the VR headset. Not quality construction for the VR/Phone combination.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G. Satalino

customer_reviews.title: Both Phones of This Brand Broke Down On Me.
customer_reviews.text: I've had two phone by this firm and both broke down on me within less that six months. I suppose there is the warranty, but then you're going to without a phone whilst that the device is away for some weeks getting fixed. It seems to have affected my sd card, as well, the one with my data in it.
customer_reviews.author: kammyland

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: SIM card got stuck, NO RETURN ISSUES! Exchange happen within 3 days. GREAT PHONE!
customer_reviews.author: Bernd J. Klawunder

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Phone of course 2mos
customer_reviews.text: Super Great Phone of course 2mos. after I bought it for $370,, they dropped the price to $219 !!!???? At $219 Super Super Great Phone the Best Yet!!
customer_reviews.author: William R Russell Jr

customer_reviews.title: A mid-range device with a flagship specs!
customer_reviews.text: This device is fire '. It's nice from its nice battery life to its camera. Its VR goggles is OK nothing that will blow you a way. Its worth its price from screen to design.
customer_reviews.author: donlonte themes

product_meta.title: Alcatel IDOL 4S Unlocked 4G LTE Android Smartphone with VR Goggles and JBL Headset -32GB - (AT&T/T-Mobile)
product_meta.description: Style:Phone with VRAlcatel IDOL4S, The Perfect Amount of Unreal. Pairing the perfect balance of superior performance and design, the Alcatel IDOL 4S with virtual reality goggles, combines high-end form and function in a value-packed device bundle. The IDOL 4S comes loaded with all the features you need in an affordably priced unlocked smartphone, including a brilliant 5.5-inch QHD 2K AMOLED display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 652 processor, 3.6-watt JBL certified speakers with Waves Audio and Synaptic’ fingerprint sensor technology. It also features an industry first smartphone + VR goggle packaging bundle: where smartphone and VR goggles are packaged together. The IDOL 4S also features Alcatel’s exclusive Boom Key which brings a variety of experience enhancements with just one push of the Boom Key button.
feature_bullets: The Alcatel IDOL 4S is the first smartphone + VR goggles package; you can explore VR experiences right out of the box
The immersive 5.5-inch Quad HD 2K display with AMOLED technology makes sure you don’t compromise resolution even in bright sunlight
Never miss a moment with a 16MP Main Camera and 8MP front-facing Camera. The pre-installed fuse app even lets you take 360 degree photos
3.6-Watt JBL certified speakers provide unreal audio that can fill a room
The exclusive boom key lets you go from pocket to picture in under One second, make instant photo collages, increase volume and bass and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars97 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 9V1.67A charger, Slim USB cable, SIM Tooling Pin, J22H headset, VR16 + premium head strap, 2.5D tempered glass protector
